attributes.action: Admit that is was wrong to allow the pension raid and gold sales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
And that Gordon Brown should say sorry to all the pensioners of the nation for raiding the pension funds of £5 billion per year.
Also for selling 400 tons of the nations gold in 1997 and losing £2billion

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
